en_question:
A sugar factory can produce up to 270 tons of sugar per month. The sugar is first transported to three warehouses: A_1, A_2, A_3, and then supplied to five regions: B_1, B_2, B_3, B_4, B_5. The storage capacities of the warehouses are 50, 100, and 150 tons respectively. The demand in each region is 25, 105, 60, 30, and 70 tons respectively. The transportation and storage costs from the sugar factory through each warehouse to each region are given in Table 3-19. Table 3-19
B1B2B3B4B5
A11015202040
A22040153030
A33035405525
Determine a transportation plan that minimizes the total cost.
cn_question:
3.15某糖厂每月最多生产糖 $270\,\mathfrak{t}$ ，先运至 $\mathrm{A}_{1},\mathrm{A}_{2},\mathrm{A}_{3}$ 三个仓库，然后再分别供应$\mathrm{B}_{1}\ ,\mathrm{B}_{2}\ ,\mathrm{B}_{3}\ ,\mathrm{B}_{4}\ ,\mathrm{B}_{5}$ 五个地区需要。已知各仓库容量分别为50,100,150（t）,各地区的需要量分别为 $25\,,105\,,60\,,30\,,70\,\,(\,\mathfrak{t}\,)$ 。已知从糖厂经由各仓库然后供应各地区的运费和储存费如表3-19所示。 表3-19
B1B2B3B4B5
A11015202040
A22040153030
A33035405525
试确定一个使总费用最低的调运方案。
